# position

Defines a position object

**Parameters**

-   `node`  

## export

## hit

Check if the specified offset is inside the current position

**Parameters**

-   `offset` **int** 

Returns **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)**
